features: 【IDEAL FOR CLEANING PET HAIR】Electrostatic rubber Bristles acts like a magnet to absorb debris and hair, during the cleaning process, debris and hair won't be blown into the air. The rubber broom bristles scrape down and ball the hair from carpets, effectively cleans hair, dirt, fur, dust and other debris on any floor surface.
【BUILT IN RUBBER SQUEEGEE】 With build in rubber squeegee edge helps remove water or liquid spills on windows, showers, and windshields. Cleans garden, balcony, patio, floor, car with ease
【EASY CLEANUP】Broom head is washable, Wash away dirt from the broom bristle just by rinsing it on tap water. You may also use soap to clean.

【INNOVATIVE CLEANING TOOL】Rubber brooms with hundreds of individual rubber brush bristles that can do the job together. Rubber broom soft enough not to scratch delicate surfaces , and Rubber broom electrostatically attract dust and pet hair.

【TELESCOPIC BROOM HANDLE】The handle length of the pet hair rubber broom is adjustable and can be extended by 24-45 inches. Suitable for people of different heights, rubber broom can also be shortened for ease of kids' use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it till it broke
reviews.reviewText: I’ve bought 2 of these I clean for a living and have recommended them repeatedly but they both have broke on the handle and it’s disappointing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Broom works well on short shag carpet, lint brush works somewhat on clothes.
reviews.reviewText: The broom works well on the short shag carpet in my daughter's apartment, it grabs the pet hair and is easy to remove from the broom. The hand tool works OK in that it moves pet hair and lint into clumps that are then easy to remove by hand, but it doesn't actually pick up the pet hair like the broom. This is apprently due to the longer softer bristles on the hand tool. The hand tool was just a bonus item to the purchase though, so all in all, we are happy with the purchase and recommend the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Remove that Dog hair!!!
reviews.reviewText: Wow. Works like magic at sweeping up dog hair from hard floors and carpets. Doesn’t miss anything. Only one draw back. The pole is not sturdy. Already snapped it in two. Still using with half a pole.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets it up
reviews.reviewText: This silicone broom picks everything up hair, dust, trash. I like the ease of use and just rinse it clean. You'll never want another broom again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love the broom but not durable
reviews.reviewText: I love this broom. It does an unbelievable job loosening dirt and hair from my carpets before vacuuming. It is also great for sweeping on tile and wood floors. My only complaint is the top metal pole used to connect the pieces together started splitting after a few months. It’s now at the point that the broom is no longer functional. I’ll replace it with a similar style but not this exact one due to the potential of it happening again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on pet hair and litter
reviews.reviewText: I use this both on rugs and on floors to clean up kitty litter tracked from the box. Works great. I also use it to clean hair and fur off the carpet before (or in between) vacuuming. The hand-held works great on furniture to get off cat hair. Works almost as well as, slightly different than, and in concert with the velour magic brush.Getting some for Christmas presents!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Loved til handle broke
reviews.reviewText: Update:So I loved the broom til handle broke. It broke where the plastic piece inside handle that connects the 2 pieces together. It would be ok, except it's the top piece that can be adjusted. I am not going to waste time or gas to return it. I am looking for a better handle. I am very sad.So the broom is perfect. I love how I can adjust the length and how wide the broom head is. The color is very pretty and the bristles are soft. The only reason for 3 stars is the hand held pet and furniture brush. The bristles are all bent. I don't know how I will be able to use it this way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was having so much trouble getting up dog hair off the stairs. These tools help so much. I was able to get so much hair out of the stairs!
